mapper.sql: id, dict_code, dict_name, item_code, item_value, parent_item_id, item_status_code, display_seq, company_id, is_directly
mapper.select: select from sys_config_dict where id = #{id} and item_status_code=1
select from sys_config_dict where item_code=#{itemCode} and item_status_code=1 limit 1
select from sys_config_dict where dict_code in ('CLASSROOM_ATTR','CLASSROOM_TYPE','CLASSROOM_KIND','CLASSROOM_RENT_TIME','CLASSROOM_LEVEL')
select from sys_config_dict where dict_code=#{code} order by id
select t2.id,t2.dict_code,t2.item_code,t2.item_value from sys_config_dict t1 LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict t2 ON t1.parent_item_id=t2.id where t1.item_code=#{str}
select item_code,item_value from sys_config_dict where dict_code='SYS_NEWS_TYPE'
select t2.item_code,t2.item_value,t2.id,t2.parent_item_id from sys_config_dict t1 LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict t2 ON t2.parent_item_id=t1.id where t1.item_code=#{itemCode} ORDER by t2.display_seq asc
select from sys_config_dict where parent_item_id=#{parentId} order by id

select scs.group_code,scs.id,scs.company_id,scd.item_value as dict_name,scd1.item_value as item_value,scs.del_flag from sys_config_service scs inner JOIN sys_config_dict scd ON scs.group_code=scd.item_code inner JOIN sys_config_dict scd1 on scs.parent_code=scd1.item_code where scs.company_id = #{companyId} and scs.group_code in('SERVICE_ONLINE_SET','SERVICE_MICROSCHOOL' ,'SERVICE_LIVE','SERVICE_VIDEO','SERVICE_COURSE_SET','SERVICE_PAY_SET','SERVICE_MSG_SET','SERVICE_MARKETING_SET','SERVICE_CLASS_SET') ORDER BY scd1.item_value desc limit #{page},#{pageSize}

select count(1) from sys_config_service scs inner JOIN sys_config_dict scd ON scs.group_code=scd.item_code inner JOIN sys_config_dict scd1 on scs.parent_code=scd1.item_code where scs.company_id = #{companyId} and scs.group_code in('SERVICE_ONLINE_SET','SERVICE_MICROSCHOOL' ,'SERVICE_LIVE','SERVICE_VIDEO','SERVICE_COURSE_SET','SERVICE_PAY_SET','SERVICE_MSG_SET','SERVICE_MARKETING_SET','SERVICE_CLASS_SET')

select emc.*,scd.item_value as edu_area_name,scd1.item_value as edu_school_name,scd2.item_value as edu_step_name from edu_master_class emc LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict scd ON emc.edu_area=scd.item_code LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict scd1 ON emc.edu_school=scd1.item_code LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict scd2 ON emc.edu_step=scd2.item_code where 1=1 and edu_area = #{eduArea} and edu_school = #{eduSchool}
